name: Disco Mosh Pit
description:
Play solo or in local multiplayer with a friend. Multiplayer only works with 2 Controllers!

Created during the 48h AGD Tiny Slam Jam: Arcade!


KEYBOARD

WASD to move

 Q/E to Dodge/Groove left and right Space to jump

P to punch

SPECIAL ATTACK O to charge special attack on the beat If you hit 4 beats in a row, you'll unleash a special attack!

CONTROLLER

Stick/Dpad to move

Left/Right bumper to Dodge/Groove left and right

A to jump

X to punch

SPECIAL ATTACK B to charge special attack on the beat If you hit 4 beats in a row, you'll unleash a special attack!
